trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_SEQ_00<tab>The Allagan tracking node is awaiting user interaction.
TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_SEQ_01<tab>The Allagan tracking node appears to be conducting some sort of training program and has challenged you to hunt down four empuses.
TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_SEQ_02<tab>You hunt down the empuses as instructed. Return to the tracking node for your performance evaluation.
TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_SEQ_03<tab>It seems the tracking node is unable to complete its training program. Given next week's hunting target, that may very well be for the best...

TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_HUNTINGSYSTEM_000_000<tab>Hello! Welcome to the Aetherochemical Research Facility employee hunting program─sponsored by the Aetherochemical Research Facility employee benefits department!

TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_HUNTINGSYSTEM_000_001<tab>Stay fit and healthy by participating in our daily hunting contest! Today's objective is four empuses! Work as fast as you can and try to beat the current record of <var 1A 02 /var>DATA NOT FOUND<var 1A 01 /var>. Ready... Go! <beep>
TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_HUNTINGSYSTEM_000_010<tab>Today's hunting objective is four empuses. Move fast! The clock is ticking!

TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_HUNTINGSYSTEM_000_020<tab><buzzzzzz> ...would like to remind all participants that laboratory assistants and laboratory property do not constitute valid targets for the purposes of... <buzzzzzz>

TEXT_HEAVNZ920_01985_HUNTINGSYSTEM_000_021<tab>Remember to come back again to...<buzzzzzz>...next week's target...<buzzzzzz>...and three <var 09 E948 ((Hyurs)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafells)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>... <buzzzzzz>
